message: Let's start fair.  I'll take 90% and you get 10%.  We can work out a better deal later if you want.
Let's split it evenly.  It's the fairest way to start.
I'm willing to go down to 60/40, but I don't think we'll get anywhere if we just keep splitting the difference.  Let's find a solution that works for both of us.
I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about a 45/55 split?  This way we both get a good deal.
